body.p: I beg to send you the book,David Copperfield. Messrs Brookes had written to CD about the appearance of their name (“Brookes of Sheffield”) in Ch. 2 of Copperfield. They sent CD a case of cutlery and CD in return offered his own copy of Copperfield (see To Messrs Brookes and Sons, 25 Apr 51; Pilgrim Letters 6, p. 362). which I find has been delayed by a mistake. Pray receive it with every assurance of my good will and esteem.
